faq.title: Frequently asked questions
faq.subtitle: We gathered answers to the most common concerns.

items.question: How early should I book?
items.answer: Ideally 4 to 6 weeks before arrival to secure housing and services.

items.question: Do you cover every province?
items.answer: Yes, we operate in Quebec, Ontario, British Columbia, and the Atlantic provinces.

items.question: Is the service available for students?
items.answer: Absolutely. We offer dedicated packages for students and young professionals.

items.question: Do you provide follow-up after installation?
items.answer: The Premium Plan includes a 30-day follow-up, with additional options on request.
